title: James Vitalo from Backtrack
itunes:title: James Vitalo from Backtrack
description:
Hard work and hustle. That’s what I think of when I look at my friend, James Vitalo. He’s the vocalist of Backtrack and manager for the band Turnstile and a person who’s taken what he’s learned and built his life around it. We discuss how he was attached to one of the most traumatic events in my life, mischief and the grind of tour. James came ready to share and because of that, we have an incredible conversation. Consider being a Bone Marrow donor, like me. Join the registry today.Try Soylent today and get 50% off of your first case, with a subscription. It’s the complete meal, in a bottle.Use our Amazon Affiliate Code to support the show!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
